preparation.raw_text:
1. Weigh out 12 g of Praseodymium (Pr). 
 2. Weigh out 8 g of Ruthenium (Ru). 
 3. Weigh out 144 g of Tin (Sn). 
 4. Weigh out 16 g of Yttrium (Y). 
 5. Combine all ingredients in a clean, dry mixing container. 
 6. Use a mortar and pestle to mix the powders thoroughly until a homogenous blend is achieved.
